title: Smart HD Camera & Filters
summary: Smart HD Camera, take colorful photos, selfies or videos and share with friends!
description: Would you like to take a high quality photo or have a photo-shoot with your friends?Surprise them with this new application - smart HD camera!smart camera make a series of fascinating pictures and share them with friends. Smart camera will edit the photos taken, add filters to your images and make them more diverse.The app support Android wear now!Excellent photo and video effects, it has never been so easy to get HD quality pictures and video. Smart HD camera to take full advantage of your phone or tablet. Now you can capture moments in a fast and easy way.With this camera app, you can create beautiful new pictures, edit and conveniently upload them to Facebook, Instagram, Picasa anytime, and another set in your application.Smart HD camera is a free application that features:Universal Camera , android photo gallery, photo editor, photo uploader to Facebook, Instagram, Gmail, Picassa and any installed application.Smart Camera features:★ Android photos★ Quickly take pictures and video★ Quick Snap★ Optical / Digital zoom★ Focus mode (auto, infinity, macro, manual, etc.)★ AutoFocus★ Touch and Focus★ Gallery for viewing and editing images★ Upload photos to Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp, Google, Twitter or another applicationAdvanced camera features:★ The "big button" for taking selfies★ Flash settings (Auto, Touch, Red eyes, Disable, etc.)★ White balance (Auto, Incandescent, Daylight, Cloudy, etc.)★ Adjusting the exposure★ Various scene mode with a variety of photo★ Scene Mode (Auto, Action, portrait, landscape, night, snow, etc.)Features a photo editor:★ Photo Effects and Photo Filters: vanilla, pastel, neon, space and photo effects.★ Supports Android from 4.0 to 6.0 version★ Tested on Samsung Galaxy Ace, Samsung Galaxy S3 Samsung Galaxy S3 Mini, Sony Xperia Arc, Sony Xperia J, Samsung Galaxy Y, Samsung Galaxy Ace 2 , Samsung Galaxy S, HTC One X, HTC Sense, HTC Desire HD, Nexus 7, Sony Ericsson Xperia Arc S, Sony Ericsson Xperia S, Sony Xperia U and works well on other phones Android.Using app smart HD camera you can take pictures special for Instagram, Facebook. Processing pictures using filters.Instagram like filters and photo frames will make your pictures more beautiful.
descriptionHTML:
Would you like to take a high quality photo or have a photo-shoot with your friends?
Surprise them with this new application - smart HD camera!
smart camera make a series of fascinating pictures and share them with friends. Smart camera will edit the photos taken, add filters to your images and make them more diverse.

The app support Android wear now!

Excellent photo and video effects, it has never been so easy to get HD quality pictures and video. Smart HD camera to take full advantage of your phone or tablet. Now you can capture moments in a fast and easy way.

With this camera app, you can create beautiful new pictures, edit and conveniently upload them to Facebook, Instagram, Picasa anytime, and another set in your application.
Smart HD camera is a free application that features:
Universal Camera , android photo gallery, photo editor, photo uploader to Facebook, Instagram, Gmail, Picassa and any installed application.
Smart Camera features:
★ Android photos
★ Quickly take pictures and video
★ Quick Snap
★ Optical / Digital zoom
★ Focus mode (auto, infinity, macro, manual, etc.)
★ AutoFocus
★ Touch and Focus
★ Gallery for viewing and editing images
★ Upload photos to Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp, Google, Twitter or another application
Advanced camera features:
★ The "big button" for taking selfies
★ Flash settings (Auto, Touch, Red eyes, Disable, etc.)
★ White balance (Auto, Incandescent, Daylight, Cloudy, etc.)
★ Adjusting the exposure
★ Various scene mode with a variety of photo
★ Scene Mode (Auto, Action, portrait, landscape, night, snow, etc.)
Features a photo editor:
★ Photo Effects and Photo Filters: vanilla, pastel, neon, space and photo effects.
★ Supports Android from 4.0 to 6.0 version
★ Tested on Samsung Galaxy Ace, Samsung Galaxy S3 Samsung Galaxy S3 Mini, Sony Xperia Arc, Sony Xperia J, Samsung Galaxy Y, Samsung Galaxy Ace 2 , Samsung Galaxy S, HTC One X, HTC Sense, HTC Desire HD, Nexus 7, Sony Ericsson Xperia Arc S, Sony Ericsson Xperia S, Sony Xperia U and works well on other phones Android.
Using app smart HD camera you can take pictures special for Instagram, Facebook. Processing pictures using filters.
Instagram like filters and photo frames will make your pictures more beautiful.
comments: Its okay I like the app.it works well,but,  when I play a video it makes a really high pitched sound. But the rest of the app works fine

It worked at 1st Im deleting it! It used to worked good at first I'm not really sure what happened but it takes pictures how wants to so sometimes your pictures come out upside down or at a dramatic angle almost sideways for no reason or extremely zoomed in but when youre looking in the lens when you're taking it it shows you completely different normal  picture it wast of time I DONT RECOMMEND AT ALL!!!
Really awesome app. Quality is best.Only improve the app launching time.
Awesome Best app for photo clicking
very good useful arun chennai india
recentChanges: Added photo editor and video preview.
Enable zoom on camera by pinch,
We are developed and implemented new super design, give me review if you like it!
We are fixed hard bug with delete and sharing photos on gallery.
We are added auto stabilisation on our camera, now all photos will be clearer.
And of course we react for all reviews.
